adult.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a fully-grown person, or one who is considered to be legally responsible for their actions
adult.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Some children find it difficult to talk to adults.
adult.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The adults have white bodies and grey backs.
adult.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He lived most of his adult life in Scotland.
adult.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: typical of an adult’s behaviour or of the things adults do
adult.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: dealing with problems in an adult way
That wasn’t very adult of you.
adult.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: adult films, magazines etc are about sex or related to sex
adult.translation[1].definitions[2].exam: The film is rated R for language and adult themes.
